name: JAPI
summary: JSON API client library with CoreData Stack JSONAPI backed store.
description:
JSON API client library with CoreData Stack JSONAPI backed store
This library solves the problems every CoreData developer faces when trying to stay in sync with a server side db.
Using JSON API the requests and responses are predictable and easy to process. It handles relationships and attributes
with ease. The CoreDataStack included allows you to work your core data db like its your server db and keeps everything in sync.
Best part, its all free!
